full_text: COUNTY Middlesex County Sanatorium COUNTY COMMISSIONERS JOHN F. DEVER. JR.. WOBURN AND LIE FREDERICK J. CONNORS. SOMERVILLE 775 Trapelo Road JOHN L. DANEHY. CAMBRIDGE TRUSTEES "MAY 1628.29 10.16459 Waltham, Massachusetts 02154 TELEPHONE ALICE M. BROADHURST, M. D. 894-4600 SUPERINTENDENT May 21, 1969 TO WHOM IT MAY CONCERN: Mr. Vidya Sagar Pahwa of 24 Temple Street, Boston, Massachusetts was x-rayed in our clinic on May 19, 1969. The lungs are clear. There are, however, old well-healed fractures of the 4th and the 5th ribs on the left toward the posterior axillary line, as well as of the 9th rib on the right toward the mid- axillary line. The heart is at the upper limits of normal with a cardio- thoracic ratio of 14.0/27.8. Very truly yours, allian Alice M. Broadhurst, M.D. SUPERINTENDENT AMB:bf
